example.input_text: Subject: Urgent VPN token reset. 'Our records show that your VPN token is about to expire. To avoid loss of access, please sign in with your corporate credentials at the following link and confirm your phone number.' The link points to a domain that visually resembles the real SSO page but is hosted on an unrelated cloud provider.

example.input_text: A threat hunt uncovers beacons from multiple hosts to a single external IP over HTTPS on a non-standard port. The HTTP headers include a custom user-agent string that mimics a legitimate browser but contains a campaign ID, and the C2 server supports tasking such as running PowerShell commands and uploading files. Which malware family does this most closely resemble?
example.context:
Choices:
A. TrickBot
B. Emotet
C. Cobalt Strike
D. WannaCry

example.input_text:
09:12: User reports slow performance on file server.
09:14: Monitoring detects spike in SMB traffic.
09:16: IDS alerts on suspicious outbound connections from the file server to an external IP.
09:20: Multiple files on the server are renamed with .lock extension and become unreadable.
09:25: Ransom note discovered in each encrypted directory.
example.gold_output: Ransomware outbreak with lateral movement from file server and outbound C2 traffic before mass encryption.
